verbs.description: as [ARG1: midterms] [V: loom] election judges are testing minnesota ballot machines election judges are testing ballot machines at hundreds of polling places across minnesota to make sure the nov 6 election goes off without a hitch steve simon minnesota election st paul ballot st paul
